headline: The Best Stocks to Invest $1,000 in Right Now
summary: The stock market has done incredibly well in 2024 and the S&P 500 is up 25% year to date.  Luckily for investors looking to put capital into the market, things have cooled down in December, with the S&P down 1% since the start of the month.  Investors should also be searching for companies with competitive advantages and solid track records of success.
